item.title: Lombok Fuckin' Hardcore
item.description: After much deliberation and changes in plan, Parul and I headed to Indonesia for our yearly break. Both of us tend to travel a lot but this is the only the only break when we do not work, or at least try not to! Last year’s vacation in Burma had been exceptionally amazing and this year we were headed to Indonesia. No Itinerary, No Problem! There had been a whole lot of confusion around this week’s destination.
